description.text: this message file contains common message for LDC Editor

msg.text: $$s[$$s] wildcard must match one object at least.
$$s[$$s] could only be set to 0 since the preference limitation
$$s[$$s] and [$$s] couldn't be set at the same time.
$$s[$$s] and [$$s] must have one object been set at least.
$$s[$$s] can't be used with [$$s] or [$$s] simultaneously.
$$s[$$s], [$$s] and [$$s] must have one object been set at least.
$$s[$$s] and [$$s] must have one factor been set at least.
$$s[$$s] must have one valid clock been set.
$$s[$$s] clock [$$s] has been used multiply times.
